Last Published: 2013-06-30  | Version: 1.0-beta-1

gplus:addSource

Full name:

org.codehaus.gmavenplus:gmavenplus-plugin:1.0-beta-1:addSource

Description:

This mojo adds Groovy sources to the project's sources

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: compile.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: initialize.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
debug boolean - Whether Groovy compiler should be set to debug
Default value is: false.
invokeDynamic boolean - Allow setting whether to support invokeDynamic (requires Java 7 or greater).
Default value is: false.
User property is: invokeDynamic.
outputDirectory File - Location for the compiled classes
Default value is: ${project.build.outputDirectory}.
sourceEncoding String - Encoding of source files
Default value is: ${project.build.sourceEncoding}.
sources FileSet[] - Groovy source files (relative paths) Default: "${project.basedir}/src/main/groovy/**/*.groovy"
testOutputDirectory File - Location for the compiled test classes
Default value is: ${project.build.testOutputDirectory}.
testSources FileSet[] - Groovy test source files (relative paths) Default: "${project.basedir}/src/test/groovy/**/*.groovy"
tolerance int - Groovy compiler error tolerance (the number of non-fatal errors (per unit) that should be tolerated before compilation is aborted).
Default value is: 0.
verbose boolean - Whether Groovy compiler should be set to verbose
Default value is: false.
warningLevel int - Groovy compiler warning level. Should be one of:
  • "0" (None)
  • "1" (Likely Errors)
  • "2" (Possible Errors)
  • "3" (Paranoia)

Default value is: 0.

Parameter Details

debug:

Whether Groovy compiler should be set to debug
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: false

invokeDynamic:

Allow setting whether to support invokeDynamic (requires Java 7 or greater).
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: invokeDynamic
  • Default: false

outputDirectory:

Location for the compiled classes
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.build.outputDirectory}

sourceEncoding:

Encoding of source files
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.build.sourceEncoding}

sources:

Groovy source files (relative paths) Default: "${project.basedir}/src/main/groovy/**/*.groovy"
  • Type: org.apache.maven.shared.model.fileset.FileSet[]
  • Required: No

testOutputDirectory:

Location for the compiled test classes
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.build.testOutputDirectory}

testSources:

Groovy test source files (relative paths) Default: "${project.basedir}/src/test/groovy/**/*.groovy"
  • Type: org.apache.maven.shared.model.fileset.FileSet[]
  • Required: No

tolerance:

Groovy compiler error tolerance (the number of non-fatal errors (per unit) that should be tolerated before compilation is aborted).
  • Type: int
  • Required: No
  • Default: 0

verbose:

Whether Groovy compiler should be set to verbose
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: false

warningLevel:

Groovy compiler warning level. Should be one of:
  • "0" (None)
  • "1" (Likely Errors)
  • "2" (Possible Errors)
  • "3" (Paranoia)
  • Type: int
  • Required: No
  • Default: 0
